Pre-Game Insights: India began their Asia Cup 2022 tournament with a thrilling win over arch-rivals Pakistan in the 2nd match of the tournament.
Virat Kohli and Ravindra Jadeja remained the top scorers for the Indian team with 35 runs each.
Hardik Pandya proved to be the difference with his unbeaten 33 runs off 17 balls at the end, guiding team India to a 5-wicket win in the last over.
Indian bowlers impressed one and all with their performance against Pakistan, especially Bhuvneshwar Kumar & Hardik Pandya.
Bhuvi and Pandya grabbed 4 and 3 wickets respectively, bowling out Pakistan in the last over of the innings.
Arshdeep Singh also picked up 2 wickets while Avesh Khan managed 1 wicket in the 2 overs he bowled.
